definition: to pull oneself up onto a moving vehicle
to peel/to skin/to tear/to pull down/to cling to (sth on which one is climbing)/to dig
to rake up/to steal/to braise/to crawl
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: A boy climbs onto the train in a Guangzhou suburb.
sentences.chinese: 廣州郊外，一個扒車的少年。

sentences.english: Can I drop it off in Melbourne?
sentences.chinese: 我能扒車放在墨爾本嗎？

sentences.english: Can I drop it off at my destination?
sentences.chinese: 我能扒車放在我的目的地嗎？
